mapper.sql: select id, from_id, to_id, remark, black, source, create_time, top from chat_friend
mapper.select: SELECT cu.user_id AS user_id, cf.remark AS nick_name, cu.portrait, cu.chat_no FROM chat_friend cf INNER JOIN chat_user cu ON cf.`to_id` = cu.user_id AND cu.deleted = 0 WHERE cf.from_id = #{userId}
